name: Atari Compilation TX9043
overview: Atari released several compilation collections in the UK on cassette, like this one labeled "TX9043" which contains 5 games: Typo Attack, Missile Command, Centipede, Realsports Tennis, and Star Raiders. Each game features a loading screen by Atari Corp UK which states the copyright date of 1987. Centipede is a conversion of the Atari 5200 Centipede, featuring much better graphics and sound than the original 1982 game. It was sold with the 'Atari 130XE Starter Pack: An Introduction to Home Computing'. Side A: Typo Attack, Missile Command, Centipede [5200] Side B: Star Raiders, Tennis
